opendial.datastructs

Class MathExpression

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.datastructs.MathExpression

  • public final class MathExpression
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of a mathematical expression whose value can be evaluated. The expression may contain unknown variables. In this case, one can evaluate the value of the expression given a particular assignment of values. The class builds on the exp4j package, see http://www.objecthunter.net/exp4j/.
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)
